title: AccessibilityTutorial

metadata.description: Learn about AccessibilityTutorial with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
[+:
Learn Accessibility
Welcome to this introductory course in Accessibility.
Accessibility is about making web pages accessible for everyone, also people with disabilites.
Learning by Reading
We have created 25 tutorial pages for you to learn the fundamentals of Accessibility:
Basic Accessibility
Introduction
Diversity
Semantic Elements
Landmarks
Buttons & Links
Role, Name & Value
Color Contrast
Color Meaning
Meaningful Images
Descriptive Image Text
Link States
Link Text
Headings
Heading Levels
Assistive Technology
Visual Focus
Skip Links
Screen Readers
Forms Introduction
Labels
Autocomplete
Errors
Zoom Introduction
Text Size
Page Zoom
Learning by Quiz Test
Test your Accessibility skills with a quiz test.
Start Accessibility Quiz

Create a free  account and get access to more features and learning materials:
View your completed tutorials, exercises, and quizzes
Keep an eye on your progress and daily streaks
Set goals and create learning paths
Create your own personal website

Note:
This is an optional feature. You can study at  without creating an account.

practice_exercises.description: Create an example that applies the concepts from this tutorial.

related_topics.title: C Common Pitfalls and How to Avoid Them

quiz.question: What is Accessibility?
options: about making web pages accessible for everyone
quiz.explanation: The correct definition of Accessibility is 'about making web pages accessible for everyone'.

quiz.question: What is This?
options: about making web pages accessible for everyone
quiz.explanation: The correct definition of This is 'an optional feature'.

summary: This tutorial covers AccessibilityTutorial concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use AccessibilityTutorial effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of AccessibilityTutorial and how to apply it in your projects.
